All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
This class stores the object in the arrayList, delete object from arrayList and compare the information of object.
Cell
Create a cell and manage the cell's size, color, position, and text within it.
CellMovement
This class allow cells to move in every 4 directions(up,down,left,right) and check if the cells can move or not.
ChooseGameModeSceneController
This class controls every action happening in ChooseGameModeScene
EndGame
This class handles everything happening in endGame scene
EndGameSceneButtons
Buttons in endGameScene
GameScene
This class build and design the gameScene and handle every actions happening in gameScene.
GameScore
This class is to store the gameScore and access the score from other classes.
GameUserName
This class is to store the userName
LoginPage
This class pop up the window where user can type in their user name in text field.
Main
Main Class
MenuSceneController
This class controls everything happening in Menu Scene.
RandomFillNumber
Fill the empty cells with random number
RecordHighestScore
This class write the user name and score in each HighestUserName.txt and HighestScore.txt if the files are empty.
TextMaker
This class make and modify the text and return it.
Timer
This class set the timer and display it in gameScene.
Top5Users
This class sorts the arrayList and with the sorted List, and it writes first 5 ( Top 5 score) in the Rank scene.
